author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Update the HCAL customisation for running the latest GRun HLT menu over 2018 data (and MC), with the Phase-0 HCAL barrel.

#### PR validation:

Check that the GRun menu can be run over 2018 data.
#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of #33133
title: Update the HLT customisation for running over 2018 data (11.2.x)
